item.title: Use Terraform to Set Up Github Pages With Route 53
item.description: It’s nice to be able to spin up everything you need for github pages all in one go. If you’re using amazon for AWS, here’s a basic terraform configuration that should do everything you want in terms of DNS. After doing this you’ll still need to specify the CNAME on your target project, and set the name servers on the domain. This requires that you’re using terraform to manage all DNS for this domain.
